response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which holds significant value to you at $12,000. We understand its importance and are eager to facilitate its acquisition. To make this opportunity more accessible, we propose a price of $10,000. This offer allows us to recoup a substantial portion of its value while providing you with an excellent deal. We believe this is a fair compromise that respects both our business interests and your valuation of the product. Please let us know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 10000}
